name: waste-management-system
description: Full-stack waste management application with AI-powered classification

scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run dev
scripts.dev:build: npm run build:frontend && npm run dev:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup:db: npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && (if exist .next rmdir /s /q .next) && (if exist out rmdir /s /q out) && (if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules)
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && (if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules)
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db

author: Your Name
